dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logical reasoning and data analysis to break down complex issues.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts, experience, and creative thinking to solve problems.

dimensions.label: Risk Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle risk in personal and professional decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh options, prioritizing stability and security.
Your FarTwin will be open to taking calculated risks, seeking new experiences and opportunities.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create schedules, set deadlines, and work methodically to achieve goals.
Your FarTwin will adapt to changing circumstances, prioritizing tasks based on urgency and importance.

dimensions.label: Teamwork and Collaboration
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in a team setting?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge, guiding the group and making key decisions.
Your FarTwin will focus on supporting teammates, providing guidance and encouragement.

dimensions.label: Creativity and Self-Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out new ideas, experimenting with novel approaches to creative expression.
Your FarTwin will rely on established techniques and mediums, drawing upon experience and skill.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision-Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving and budgeting, seeking value in every dollar.
Your FarTwin will invest in experiences, people, and opportunities, focusing on long-term growth.

dimensions.label: Emotional Regulation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will engage in self-reflection, acknowledging and addressing emotions.
Your FarTwin will openly express emotions, seeking support from others when needed.

dimensions.label: Learning and Personal Growth
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach continuous learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new knowledge, exploring topics with enthusiasm.
Your FarTwin will carefully consider their experiences, analyzing and integrating new insights.
